Quote.Author: Marc Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: Clothes mean nothing until someone lives in them

Quote.Author: Marc Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a yogi, but I know the sun salutation

Quote.Author: Marc Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: I love attention. Maybe my desire for attention is a little too out of control, but I'm very honest

Quote.Author: Marc Jacobs
Quote.QuoteValue: I still appreciate individuality. Style is much more interesting than fashion, really

Quote.Author: Marc Maron
Quote.QuoteValue: For my next trick I will make everyone understand me

Quote.Author: Marc Maron
Quote.QuoteValue: The bile makes it better. I am an information wasting machine - 100s of words a day

Quote.Author: Marc Maron
Quote.QuoteValue: We need the children of Indonesia and the Philippines to manufacture our freedom of choice

Quote.Author: Marc Maron
Quote.QuoteValue: Surveillance induced morality: relics of cultural retardation

Quote.Author: Marc Maron
Quote.QuoteValue: In the sixties and seventies you could probably name all the great comics. It was still special

Quote.Author: Marc Maron
Quote.QuoteValue: Left wing, right wing, I am wingless and tired of trying to fly. Here comes the ground

Quote.Author: Marc Maron
Quote.QuoteValue: On some level any appearance on Television can be seen as a product endorsement

Quote.Author: Marc Maron
Quote.QuoteValue: It's easy to maintain your integrity when no one is offering to buy it out

Quote.Author: Marc Maron
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not completely sure we aren't all living in a hallucination now

Quote.Author: Marc Maron
Quote.QuoteValue: The next evolutionary step is into the screen

Quote.Author: Marcel Duchamp
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in art. I believe in artists

Quote.Author: Marcel Duchamp
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything important that I have done can be put into a little suitcase

Quote.Author: Marcel Duchamp
Quote.QuoteValue: A painting that doesn't shock isn't worth painting

Quote.Author: Marcel Duchamp
Quote.QuoteValue: Living is more a question of what one spends than what one makes

Quote.Author: Marcel Duchamp
Quote.QuoteValue: I am interested in ideas, not merely in visual products

Quote.Author: Marcel Duchamp
Quote.QuoteValue: Marcel, no more painting; go get a job

Quote.Author: Marcel Duchamp
Quote.QuoteValue: Chess can be described as the movement of pieces eating one another

Quote.Author: Marcel Duchamp
Quote.QuoteValue: Dada was an extreme protest against the physical side of painting. It was a metaphysical attitude

Quote.Author: Marcel Duchamp
Quote.QuoteValue: Alchemy is a kind of philosophy: a kind of thinking that leads to a way of understanding

Quote.Author: Marcel Duchamp
Quote.QuoteValue: From a purely ethnological point of view, I was not a period-born Dada

Quote.Author: Marcel Proust
Quote.QuoteValue: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes

Quote.Author: Marcel Proust
Quote.QuoteValue: A change in the weather is sufficient to recreate the world and ourselves

Quote.Author: Marcel Proust
Quote.QuoteValue: Time, which changes people, does not alter the image we have retained of them

Quote.Author: Marcel Proust
Quote.QuoteValue: The only real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes but in having new eyes

Quote.Author: Marcel Proust
Quote.QuoteValue: Only through art can we emerge from ourselves and know what another person sees

Quote.Author: Marcel Proust
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is space and time measured by the heart

Quote.Author: Marcel Proust
Quote.QuoteValue: What a profound significance small things assume when the woman we love conceals them from us

Quote.Author: Marcel Proust
Quote.QuoteValue: The voyage of discovery is not in seeking new landscapes but in having new eyes

Quote.Author: Marcel Proust
Quote.QuoteValue: The only paradise is paradise lost

Quote.Author: Marcel Proust
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is beneficial for the body, but it is grief that develops the powers of the mind

Quote.Author: Marco Rubio
Quote.QuoteValue: Conservatives aren't anti-immigrant - conservatives are pro-legal immigration

Quote.Author: Marco Rubio
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in a society obsessed with public opinion. But leadership has never been about popularity

Quote.Author: Marco Rubio
Quote.QuoteValue: Exile is not a time frame. Exile is an experience. It's a sentiment

Quote.Author: Marco Rubio
Quote.QuoteValue: I am privileged to be a citizen of the single greatest society in all of human history

Quote.Author: Marco Rubio
Quote.QuoteValue: This is the only country in the world where today's employee, is tomorrow's employer

Quote.Author: Marco Rubio
Quote.QuoteValue: We will either bring on another American century, or we are doomed to witness America's decline

Quote.Author: Marco Rubio
Quote.QuoteValue: Americans chose a limited government that exists to protect our rights, not to grant them

Quote.Author: Marco Rubio
Quote.QuoteValue: Every single one of us is the descendant of a go-getter. Of dreamers and of believers

Quote.Author: Marco Rubio
Quote.QuoteValue: No community values entrepreneurship and small business more than the Hispanic community

Quote.Author: Marco Rubio
Quote.QuoteValue: We Americans are as great as we have ever been. But our government is broken

Quote.Author: Marcus Garvey
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life

Quote.Author: Marcus Garvey
Quote.QuoteValue: The Black skin is not a badge of shame, but rather a glorious symbol of national greatness

Quote.Author: Marcus Garvey
Quote.QuoteValue: With confidence, you have won before you have started

Quote.Author: Marcus Garvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Real men laugh at opposition; real men smile when enemies appear

Quote.Author: Marcus Garvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Men who are in earnest are not afraid of consequences

Quote.Author: Marcus Garvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Chance has never yet satisfied the hope of a suffering people

Quote.Author: Marcus Garvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Emancipate yourselves from mental slavery, none but ourselves can free our minds!

Quote.Author: Marcus Garvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberate the minds of men and ultimately you will liberate the bodies of men

Quote.Author: Marcus Garvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Look to Africa, for there a king will be crowned

Quote.Author: Marcus Garvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Look for me in the whirlwind or the storm

Quote.Author: Marcus Luttrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't wait to get back to the ranch and go back to easy living

Quote.Author: Marcus Luttrell
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not secret that usually I don't have a filter

Quote.Author: Marcus Luttrell
Quote.QuoteValue: What comes through my head is going to come out of my mouth

Quote.Author: Marcus Luttrell
Quote.QuoteValue: I died on that mountain, too. I left a part of myself up there

Quote.Author: Marcus Luttrell
Quote.QuoteValue: Who among you will love something more than you love yourself, all right?

Quote.Author: Marcus Luttrell
Quote.QuoteValue: We have to make sure the Hell the veterans come home from is not the Hell they come back to

Quote.Author: Marcus Luttrell
Quote.QuoteValue: To the next generation, your war is here; you don't have to find it

Quote.Author: Marcus Luttrell
Quote.QuoteValue: If you knew the real me, you'd want to keep your distance from me. Seriously

Quote.Author: Marcus Luttrell
Quote.QuoteValue: If we became buddies, obviously I'd start throwing some cracks at Him

Quote.Author: Marcus Luttrell
Quote.QuoteValue: War's not black and white; it's gray. If you don't fight in the gray area, you're going to lose

Quote.Author: Marcus Samuelsson
Quote.QuoteValue: My family's journey is something I am very proud of - in front of me, behind me and every part

Quote.Author: Marcus Samuelsson
Quote.QuoteValue: Criticism is part of the creative man's journey, and I appreciate it

Quote.Author: Marcus Samuelsson
Quote.QuoteValue: Healthy can be the new good. Eating delicious should not be sacrificed because it's healthy

Quote.Author: Marcus Samuelsson
Quote.QuoteValue: Each city should have its own type of restaurant

Quote.Author: Marcus Samuelsson
Quote.QuoteValue: Oatmeal is a cheap and healthy breakfast

Quote.Author: Marcus Samuelsson
Quote.QuoteValue: Simple ingredients can be used to make elegant dishes with just a little extra attention to detail

Quote.Author: Marcus Samuelsson
Quote.QuoteValue: Childhood nutrition and healthy eating is a cause that is extremely close to my heart

Quote.Author: Marcus Samuelsson
Quote.QuoteValue: Packing lunches and going over menus is a great way to make small changes in the way your kids eat

Quote.Author: Marcus Samuelsson
Quote.QuoteValue: Spices, of course, are essential

Quote.Author: Marcus Samuelsson
Quote.QuoteValue: I happen to love coconut, particularly for that sweet and crunchy texture it adds to any dish

Quote.Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote.QuoteValue: The life of the dead is placed in the memory of the living

Quote.Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote.QuoteValue: What then is freedom? The power to live as one wishes

Quote.Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have a garden and a library, you have everything you need

Quote.Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote.QuoteValue: Silence is one of the great arts of conversation

Quote.Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote.QuoteValue: Any man can make mistakes, but only an idiot persists in his error

Quote.Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote.QuoteValue: The safety of the people shall be the highest law

Quote.Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote.QuoteValue: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all the others

Quote.Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote.QuoteValue: A friend is, as it were, a second self

Quote.Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote.QuoteValue: More law, less justice

Quote.Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote.QuoteValue: When you have no basis for an argument, abuse the plaintiff

Quote.Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: Every aspect of human technology has a dark side, including the bow and arrow

Quote.Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: Heroes need monsters to establish their heroic credentials. You need something scary to overcome

Quote.Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: Optimism means better than reality; pessimism means worse than reality. I'm a realist

Quote.Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing about delirium is you think it's great, but it actually isn't

Quote.Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: Another belief of mine; that everyone else my age is an adult, whereas I am merely in disguise

Quote.Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: If I waited for perfection... I would never write a word

Quote.Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: In the spring, at the end of the day, you should smell like dirt

Quote.Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: A word after a word after a word is power

Quote.Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: When things are really dismal, you can laugh, or you can cave in completely

Quote.Author: Margaret Atwood
Quote.QuoteValue: Once upon a time, novelists of the 19th century, such as Charles Dickens, published in serial form

Quote.Author: Margaret Cho
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes the only way to deal with horrific things in life is through a dark sense of humor

Quote.Author: Margaret Cho
Quote.QuoteValue: Why go through life feeling cheated? It does nothing but make you bitter

Quote.Author: Margaret Cho
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe I wanted to hear it so badly that my ears betrayed my mind in order to secure my heart

Quote.Author: Margaret Cho
Quote.QuoteValue: The incognito of lower class employment is an effective cloak for any dagger one might wish to hide

Quote.Author: Margaret Cho
Quote.QuoteValue: I love drugs, but I hate hangovers, and the hatred of the hangover wins by a landslide every time

Quote.Author: Margaret Cho
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the big booming beat which covers up the noise of hate

Quote.Author: Margaret Cho
Quote.QuoteValue: If you say you're not a feminist, you're almost denying your own existence

Quote.Author: Margaret Cho
Quote.QuoteValue: To be a feminist is to be alive

Quote.Author: Margaret Cho
Quote.QuoteValue: Just because you are blind and unable to see my beauty doesn't mean it does not exist

Quote.Author: Margaret Cho
Quote.QuoteValue: I will never stop complaining

Quote.Author: Margaret Heffernan
Quote.QuoteValue: For good ideas and true innovation, you need human interaction, conflict, argument, debate

Quote.Author: Margaret Heffernan
Quote.QuoteValue: If we aren't going to be afraid of conflict, we have to see it as thinking

Quote.Author: Margaret Heffernan
Quote.QuoteValue: The medical profession is - and knows itself to be - endemically conservative and conformist

Quote.Author: Margaret Heffernan
Quote.QuoteValue: Making those around you feel invisible is the opposite of leadership

Quote.Author: Margaret Heffernan
Quote.QuoteValue: Building businesses takes tremendous stamina, and success isn't achieved without it

Quote.Author: Margaret Heffernan
Quote.QuoteValue: In business, staying focused requires that you turn most opportunities down

Quote.Author: Margaret Heffernan
Quote.QuoteValue: Noise is a buffer, more effective than cubicles or booth walls

Quote.Author: Margaret Heffernan
Quote.QuoteValue: British innovation in design, in the creative arts, in engineering and manufacturing is world class

Quote.Author: Margaret Heffernan
Quote.QuoteValue: Britain is famous for being great at inventing and poor at commercializing

Quote.Author: Margaret Heffernan
Quote.QuoteValue: It is nobody's right to be waited on and nobody's fate to do the waiting

Quote.Author: Margaret Mead
Quote.QuoteValue: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else

Quote.Author: Margaret Mead
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned the value of hard work by working hard

Quote.Author: Margaret Mead
Quote.QuoteValue: We won't have a society if we destroy the environment

Quote.Author: Margaret Mead
Quote.QuoteValue: I was wise enough to never grow up while fooling most people into believing I had

Quote.Author: Margaret Mead
Quote.QuoteValue: What people say, what people do, and what they say they do are entirely different things

Quote.Author: Margaret Mead
Quote.QuoteValue: Fathers are biological necessities, but social accidents

Quote.Author: Margaret Mead
Quote.QuoteValue: And when our baby stirs and struggles to be born it compels humility: what we began is now its own

Quote.Author: Margaret Mead
Quote.QuoteValue: We have nowhere else to go... this is all we have

Quote.Author: Margaret Mead
Quote.QuoteValue: Women want mediocre men, and men are working to be as mediocre as possible

Quote.Author: Margaret Mead
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not believe in using women in combat, because females are too fierce

Quote.Author: Margaret Thatcher
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want something said, ask a man; if you want something done, ask a woman

Quote.Author: Margaret Thatcher
Quote.QuoteValue: The problem with socialism is that you eventually run out of other peoples' money

Quote.Author: Margaret Thatcher
Quote.QuoteValue: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it

Quote.Author: Margaret Thatcher
Quote.QuoteValue: Power is like being a lady... if you have to tell people you are, you aren't

Quote.Author: Margaret Thatcher
Quote.QuoteValue: You and I come by road or rail, but economists travel on infrastructure

Quote.Author: Margaret Thatcher
Quote.QuoteValue: It may be the cock that crows, but it is the hen that lays the eggs

Quote.Author: Margaret Thatcher
Quote.QuoteValue: Europe was created by history. America was created by philosophy

Quote.Author: Margaret Thatcher
Quote.QuoteValue: There can be no liberty unless there is economic liberty

Quote.Author: Margaret Thatcher
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is more obstinate than a fashionable consensus

Quote.Author: Margaret Thatcher
Quote.QuoteValue: This lady is not for turning

Quote.Author: Margot Robbie
Quote.QuoteValue: I have many moments of self doubt. Everybody does

Quote.Author: Margot Robbie
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got big, big dreams for the future

Quote.Author: Margot Robbie
Quote.QuoteValue: I get miserable if I don't eat

Quote.Author: Margot Robbie
Quote.QuoteValue: I swear I'm not bossy in any other aspect of my life - it's just on set

Quote.Author: Margot Robbie
Quote.QuoteValue: Playing a bad guy is always more fun than playing the good guy

Quote.Author: Margot Robbie
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone's like, 'overnight sensation.' It's not overnight. It's years of hard work

Quote.Author: Margot Robbie
Quote.QuoteValue: All your mannerisms change easily when you have inch-long acrylic nails

Quote.Author: Margot Robbie
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm never happier than when I'm on set

Quote.Author: Margot Robbie
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I see a piano, I have this urge to play it

Quote.Author: Margot Robbie
Quote.QuoteValue: New York is the coolest city. The place just never sleeps. It's amazing

Quote.Author: Maria Sharapova
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be different. If everyone is wearing black, I want to be wearing red

Quote.Author: Maria Sharapova
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't please everyone. That's not in my J.D., you know, not in my job description

Quote.Author: Maria Sharapova
Quote.QuoteValue: I know my roots and I cannot forget the journey I made

Quote.Author: Maria Sharapova
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned there's a big difference between juniors and the pros

Quote.Author: Maria Sharapova
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not the next anyone, I'm the first Maria Sharapova

Quote.Author: Maria Sharapova
Quote.QuoteValue: Without my dad, I wouldn't be here

Quote.Author: Maria Sharapova
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, fans always root for the underdog

Quote.Author: Maria Sharapova
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I feel my arm is like a swan's neck - so weak

Quote.Author: Maria Sharapova
Quote.QuoteValue: There are days when I go out on the court and I feel like I can't miss a ball

Quote.Author: Maria Sharapova
Quote.QuoteValue: As an individual, I take every match seriously, no matter who I'm going to play

Quote.Author: Mariah Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a light at the end of the tunnel... hopefully its not a freight train!

Quote.Author: Mariah Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: Butterflies are always following me, everywhere I go

Quote.Author: Mariah Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather be onstage with a pig - a duet with Jennifer Lopez and me just ain't going to happen

Quote.Author: Mariah Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: Whatever you're going through in your life, don't ever give up

Quote.Author: Mariah Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: I really rebel against authority

Quote.Author: Mariah Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: In this world, I call the shots and I think I know best

Quote.Author: Mariah Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: Never, never listen to anybody that try to discourage you

Quote.Author: Mariah Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother is Irish, my father is black and Venezuelan, and me - I'm tan, I guess

Quote.Author: Mariah Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: I try not to be a jerk. I really do. I try to be nice and cordial

Quote.Author: Mariah Carey
Quote.QuoteValue: I've seen the real extreme diva behaviour and I don't think that's who I am

Quote.Author: Marian Wright Edelman
Quote.QuoteValue: No person has the right to rain on your dreams

Quote.Author: Marian Wright Edelman
Quote.QuoteValue: Family and moral values are so central to everything that I am

Quote.Author: Marian Wright Edelman
Quote.QuoteValue: You really can change the world if you care enough

Quote.Author: Marian Wright Edelman
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't feel entitled to anything you didn't sweat and struggle for

Quote.Author: Marian Wright Edelman
Quote.QuoteValue: If we don't stand up for children, then we don't stand for much

Quote.Author: Marian Wright Edelman
Quote.QuoteValue: Never work just for money or for power. They won't save your soul or help you sleep at night

Quote.Author: Marian Wright Edelman
Quote.QuoteValue: Being considerate of others will take your children further in life than any college degree

Quote.Author: Marian Wright Edelman
Quote.QuoteValue: Service is what life is all about

Quote.Author: Marian Wright Edelman
Quote.QuoteValue: We do not have a money problem in America. We have a values and priorities problem

Quote.Author: Marian Wright Edelman
Quote.QuoteValue: You're not obligated to win. You're obligated to keep trying to do the best you can every day

Quote.Author: Marianne Williamson
Quote.QuoteValue: The top of one mountain is always the bottom of another

Quote.Author: Marianne Williamson
Quote.QuoteValue: The holidays are only holy if we make them so

Quote.Author: Marianne Williamson
Quote.QuoteValue: Spiritual 'exercise' keeps your mind in shape the way physical exercise keeps your body in shape

Quote.Author: Marianne Williamson
Quote.QuoteValue: Prayer is the medium of miracles; in whatever way works for you, pray right now

Quote.Author: Marianne Williamson
Quote.QuoteValue: The key to abundance is meeting limited circumstances with unlimited thoughts

Quote.Author: Marianne Williamson
Quote.QuoteValue: God is limitless in His love, and asks that we at least make the effort to be limitless in ours

Quote.Author: Marianne Williamson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think of prayer as a spiritual lifeline back to where I most want to be

Quote.Author: Marianne Williamson
Quote.QuoteValue: The first step in forgiveness is the willingness to forgive

Quote.Author: Marianne Williamson
Quote.QuoteValue: Anytime you try to be a loving person, you're doing your part to save the world

Quote.Author: Marianne Williamson
Quote.QuoteValue: My self healing lies in praying for those who have harmed me

Quote.Author: Marie von Ebne
Quote.QuoteValue: schenbach - Even a stopped clock is right twice a day

Quote.Author: Marie von Ebne
Quote.QuoteValue: schenbach - If you have one good idea, people will lend you twenty

Quote.Author: Marie von Ebne
Quote.QuoteValue: schenbach - We don't believe in rheumatism and true love until after the first attack

Quote.Author: Marie von Ebne
Quote.QuoteValue: schenbach - What delights us in visible beauty is the invisible

Quote.Author: Marie von Ebne
Quote.QuoteValue: schenbach - To be content with little is hard; to be content with much, impossible

Quote.Author: Marie von Ebne
Quote.QuoteValue: schenbach - Not what we experience, but how we perceive what we experience, determines our fate

Quote.Author: Marie von Ebne
Quote.QuoteValue: schenbach - In youth we learn; in age we understand

Quote.Author: Marie von Ebne
Quote.QuoteValue: schenbach - We are so vain that we even care for the opinion of those we don't care for

Quote.Author: Marie von Ebne
Quote.QuoteValue: schenbach - Exceptions are not always the proof of the old rule; they can also be the harbinger of a new one

Quote.Author: Marie von Ebne
Quote.QuoteValue: schenbach - Nobody knows enough, but many know too much

Quote.Author: Marilyn Manson
Quote.QuoteValue: When all of your wishes are granted, many of your dreams will be destroyed

Quote.Author: Marilyn Manson
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to make people think differently than they did before I walked in the room

Quote.Author: Marilyn Manson
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, Satan ultimately represents rebellion

Quote.Author: Marilyn Manson
Quote.QuoteValue: Part of me is afraid to get close to people because I'm afraid that they're going to leave

Quote.Author: Marilyn Manson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you lose who you are, what do you have?

Quote.Author: Marilyn Manson
Quote.QuoteValue: If Satan wasn't around, churches would go out of business

Quote.Author: Marilyn Manson
Quote.QuoteValue: People tend to associate anyone who looks and behaves differently with illegal or immoral activity

Quote.Author: Marilyn Manson
Quote.QuoteValue: I pity anybody who has to spend a day with me

Quote.Author: Marilyn Manson
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear is something I instill in other people, mostly young girls

Quote.Author: Marilyn Manson
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're taught to love everyone, to love your enemies, then what value does that place on love?

Quote.Author: Marilyn vos Savant
Quote.QuoteValue: To acquire knowledge, one must study; but to acquire wisdom, one must observe

Quote.Author: Marilyn vos Savant
Quote.QuoteValue: Be able to defend your arguments in a rational way. Otherwise, all you have is an opinion

Quote.Author: Marilyn vos Savant
Quote.QuoteValue: Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent

Quote.Author: Marilyn vos Savant
Quote.QuoteValue: Be able to go shopping for a bathing suit and not become depressed afterward

Quote.Author: Marilyn vos Savant
Quote.QuoteValue: Have you ever noticed that when you must struggle to hear something, you close your eyes?

Quote.Author: Marilyn vos Savant
Quote.QuoteValue: Know how to effectively voice a complaint or make a claim at a retail store

Quote.Author: Marilyn vos Savant
Quote.QuoteValue: Avoid using cigarettes, alcohol, and drugs as alternatives to being an interesting person

Quote.Author: Marilyn vos Savant
Quote.QuoteValue: Be able to analyze statistics, which can be used to support or undercut almost any argument

Quote.Author: Marilyn vos Savant
Quote.QuoteValue: Be able to correctly pronounce the words you would like to speak and have excellent spoken grammar

Quote.Author: Marilyn vos Savant
Quote.QuoteValue: Be able to draw an illustration as least well enough to get your point across to another person

Quote.Author: Marina Abramovic
Quote.QuoteValue: We always project into the future or reflect in the past, but we are so little in the present

Quote.Author: Marina Abramovic
Quote.QuoteValue: Performance has to be mainstream art. This is what I'm fighting for

Quote.Author: Marina Abramovic
Quote.QuoteValue: People have so much pain inside them that they're not even aware of

Quote.Author: Marina Abramovic
Quote.QuoteValue: In theater, blood is ketchup; in performance, everything's real

Quote.Author: Marina Abramovic
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness comes from the full understanding of your own being

Quote.Author: Marina Abramovic
Quote.QuoteValue: So many artists say they're not aware of audience. For me is unbelievable

Quote.Author: Marina Abramovic
Quote.QuoteValue: People put so much effort into starting a relationship and so little effort into ending one

Quote.Author: Marina Abramovic
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't choreograph death, but you can choreograph your funeral

Quote.Author: Marina Abramovic
Quote.QuoteValue: Artists can do whatever they want!

Quote.Author: Marina Abramovic
Quote.QuoteValue: In my work I have complete control, but about my life, I don't want to

Quote.Author: Marine Le Pen
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's close all the Islamist mosques

Quote.Author: Marine Le Pen
Quote.QuoteValue: The British have chosen liberty with Brexit and can congratulate themselves every day

Quote.Author: Marine Le Pen
Quote.QuoteValue: Multicultural societies are multi-conflict societies

Quote.Author: Marine Le Pen
Quote.QuoteValue: If anything, I'm to the left of Obama

Quote.Author: Marine Le Pen
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics for me started in violence

Quote.Author: Marine Le Pen
Quote.QuoteValue: Russia is an important power upon which the U.S.A. imposed a Cold War

Quote.Author: Marine Le Pen
Quote.QuoteValue: French citizenship should be either inherited or merited

Quote.Author: Marine Le Pen
Quote.QuoteValue: France is different from the U.S.A.'s El Dorado, American Dream image

Quote.Author: Marine Le Pen
Quote.QuoteValue: Islamist terrorism is a cancer on Islam, and Muslims themselves must fight it at our side

Quote.Author: Marine Le Pen
Quote.QuoteValue: Voila, we're all molded by our personal paths, which forge our sensibilities

Quote.Author: Mario Andretti
Quote.QuoteValue: If everything seems under control, you're just not going fast enough

Quote.Author: Mario Andretti
Quote.QuoteValue: I count my blessings every day, quite honestly, because I take nothing for granted

Quote.Author: Mario Andretti
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything comes to those who wait... except a cat

Quote.Author: Mario Andretti
Quote.QuoteValue: You're safer in the race car than you are in cars going to and from the track

Quote.Author: Mario Andretti
Quote.QuoteValue: If a neighbor is killed in a car accident, do you sell your car and stop driving?

Quote.Author: Mario Andretti
Quote.QuoteValue: I look at myself as the luckiest man alive

Quote.Author: Mario Andretti
Quote.QuoteValue: Circumstances may cause interruptions and delays, but never lose sight of your goal

Quote.Author: Mario Andretti
Quote.QuoteValue: Anybody who can drive and doesn't come out of it a rich man is a fool

Quote.Author: Mario Andretti
Quote.QuoteValue: If you wait, all that happens is that you get older

Quote.Author: Mario Andretti
Quote.QuoteValue: Unfortunately, we don't educate drivers enough to be respectful on the road

Quote.Author: Mario Batali
Quote.QuoteValue: Unlike curing cancer or heart disease, we already know how to beat hunger: food

Quote.Author: Mario Batali
Quote.QuoteValue: Michigan is my antidote to Manhattan. This is where I come to relax

Quote.Author: Mario Batali
Quote.QuoteValue: I put hibiscus flower in every cup of tea I have. It's sweet, sexy, and cleansing

Quote.Author: Mario Batali
Quote.QuoteValue: My wife Susi and my kids quite simply are the most fun of all my friends

Quote.Author: Mario Batali
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to live life to its full chorizo

Quote.Author: Mario Batali
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a battle between what the cook thinks is high art and what the customer just wants to eat
